Control Name: 1.2.5 Every environment has a target end-date.
Control Statement: If your workload or environment isn't needed then you should be able to decommission it. The same should occur if you are introducing a new service or new feature.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.2 How do you govern budgets and application lifespan for this workload?
